summary.title: Personal Summary
summary.list: ["Proficient in Vue, Html, Css, Js, Es6, TypeScript, Git", "Familiar with Vite, Electron, NodeJs, ReactNative, ElementUi, NaiveUi, Less", "Skilled in using tools such as Linux, Nginx, Sqlite3, MySql, Redis, Docker", "Strong execution ability, proactive communication, good at finding optimal solutions to problems, and committed to lifelong learning"]

job.title: Work Experience
job.list: [{"company":"Beijing Jiebeisi Information Technology Consulting Co., Ltd. (Aug 2023 - Present)","name":"Frontend Developer","content":"Stationed at Kunshan Rural Commercial Bank, I participated in and took charge of projects including Kun Xiaozhi, Dual-end Marketing Campaign System, Business Opportunity Management System and Data Middle Platform. Throughout the project lifecycle, I proactively engaged in cross-team collaboration and communication, acting as the first responder to address technical challenges and drive project delivery."},{"company":"Shenzhen Faben Information Technology Co., Ltd. (Nov 2021 - Jul 2023)","name":"Frontend Developer","content":"Mainly participated in outsourcing projects for China UnionPay and SAIC Volkswagen. During this period, helped clients quickly build back-end management system pages, achieving ahead-of-schedule launch. After the launch, actively worked on-site, took the initiative to communicate with clients about requirements, troubleshoot problems, and continuously optimize the project, ultimately winning client satisfaction."},{"company":"Wuxi Yazuo Online Technology Co., Ltd. (Sep 2019 - May 2020)","name":"Full Stack Developer","content":"Led the internship team to complete the onboarding project defense designed by the company. The program lasted for 3 months, during which we sorted out the main process of the project, making each team member have clear goals and business logic. And formulated a detailed division of labor plan. Finally, the project was launched as scheduled, winning praise from the product manager. Subsequently, responsible for the development and maintenance of the company's cash register management system, and regularly sorted out interface and business documents."},{"company":"Shanghai Sunzhi Software Co., Ltd. (Jul 2018 - Aug 2019)","name":"Full Stack Developer","content":"Responsible for the development, testing and optimization of the company's portal website pages, the development and maintenance of basic back-end interfaces for the website, and regularly sorted out interface, business and scheme documents."}]

project.title: Project Experience
project.list: [{"name":"Data Middle Platform (Vue2, Echarts)","ic":"A comprehensive system for managing and governing data","cc":"Responsible for the data exploration module, as well as system update calling details display, etc.","dc":"Custom large-screen chart display, personalized customization of rich text editor, and algorithm design of multi-level and multi-dimensional calling rules for AI project_me.title: Personal Projects
project_me.list: [{"name":"Duo Life App (ReactNative, Expo)","ic":"Personal to-do daily software for mobile phones","cc":"Including to-do, notes, schedule, statistics, book house, tags and other modules.","dc":"Learning and packaging of Expo, learning of ReactNative and component style design, mobile ECharts adaptation, etc.","link":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV12X4y127Dc?t=3.9"},{"name":"Duo Life EXE (Vue3, Electron-vite, Element-Plus)","ic":"Personal to-do daily software for computers","cc":"Including home page, to-do, Baidu Map, reminders, messages, notes, AI assistant, plans, book house, album, settings, tags, daily, XMind, important days and other modules.","dc":"Custom Baidu Map adaptation, learning and packaging of Electron, learning of SQLite and SQL statement query optimization, query queue design, etc.","link":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1pw411U7cq?t=3.2"},{"name":"My Online Resume (Vue3, NaiveUI, I18n)","ic":"Personal resume website","cc":"A minimalist resume website without servers and backends, supporting bilingualism, theme switching, and online editing.","dc":"This includes theme switching, Chinese-English language switching, fetching updated data through the GitHub API, handling Chinese character decoding, and resolving the issue of text being cut off when exporting to PDF.","link":"https://hehedan.github.io/"}]
